price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߣߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߓߟߏߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߜߘߍ߫ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߞߊ߲߬ ߓߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߎ߬ ߟߊ߬ߞߎߣߎ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
